about_the_game:
Hats and Hand Grenades: Capture the Hat DLC adds an all-new game mode in which players must steal hats and return them to specific points on the map. The most fun game mode yet! In addition to Capture the Hat mode, this DLC adds 5 new levels, 5 new songs, and 5 new hats.

New levels include the gates, iceberg, hot springs, spires, and valley arenas.

New hats include the fez, headphones, pope, jester, and chef hat.

If you buy Capture the Hat but your friends don't, not to worry! You can still vote for the new mode and levels in the pre-game lottery and wear DLC hats, even when playing with non-DLC players. Non-DLC owners will still get a chance to enjoy Capture the Hat, steal DLC hats, and play on DLC levels, as long as at least one one person in your lobby owns the DLC.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains gun violence and blood.
